question: Who is the author of the book "Tiger Woman"?
explanation: The book titled \"Tiger Woman\" has been authored by Bengali novelist Sirsho Bandopadhyay. It is translated by Arunava Sinha from the Bengali version \"Shardulsundori\" is set in the Calcutta of the 1880s. Itâ€™s a historical novel that places a tragic love triangle in an era of patriotism and the Great Bengal Circus became a metaphor for a frustrated social revolution.
